item.title: ABBA - Mamma Mia
item.description:
Ukulele play along
Mamma Mia - ABBA
Using the chords: A Bm C D Em F#m G
Suggested Strum Pattern: D DU D DU You can be quite flexible with the strumming, there are a few single strums
Website: http://ukulele.wales/ Ukulele Wales Channel: http://www.youtube.com/c/UkuleleWales T-Shirts & Merch: https:https://www.redbubble.com/people/ukulaliens/shop
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: ABBA - Waterloo
item.description:
Ukulele play along - Easy
Waterloo - ABBA
Using the chords: Am C D7 F G G7
Suggested Strum Patterns: DU DU DU DU
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: ABBA - Mamma Mia - Key of D
item.description:
This video was created by the SUNY Fredonia Ukulele Club and is for educational purposes ONLY.
All rights belong to ABBA, Bjorn Ulvaeus, Stig Anderson and Benny Anderson.
Chords Used: D, A, G, Bm, Gbm, Em
Check out our Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/fredoniaukuleleclub
Like our page on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/fredoniaukuleleclub/?ref=aymt_homepage_panel
Strum on!

item.title: ABBA - Take A Chance On Me - Key of C
ABBA - Dancing Queen - Key of G
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of G.
As performed by ABBA.
Uses a version of the song without (or with reduced) voices to encourage your own singing while still having a “backing track” available? Want a version with the voices?Look for a similar song with “Ukulele Play Along.”
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
Are these ukulele resources valuable to you? If so, consider following my blog at ukestuff.info, and becoming a patron at www.patreon.com/cjrphd.

item.title: ABBA - I Have A Dream - Key of A
item.description: Chords are A, E7, and D
